analysis.description:
onethousand.annualInterest (/unique_chucks/9/0x1d10997e92011398a20612f9ee87e33449bc1fe4.sol#233-244) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 1
